data.name: BookshelfMoreMenuAddQuickAccess
data.value: Add this place to quick access

data.name: BookshelfMoreMenuClearHistory
data.value: Delete all history of this place

data.name: CommandClearHistoryInPlaceNote
data.value: Delete all history in the current location of the bookshelf.

data.name: CommandCopyFileNote
data.value: Copy the file to the clipboard.

data.name: CommandCopyImageNote
data.value: Copy the image to the clipboard. For 2 page display, copy only the main page.

data.name: CommandDeleteBookNote
data.value: Delete the currently viewed folder or compressed file.

data.name: CommandDeleteFileNote
data.value: Delete the file. It can not be deleted for compressed files.

data.name: CommandExportBackupNote
data.value: Create backups of settings, history, bookmarks, page marks. The thumbnail cache is not backed up.

data.name: CommandExportImageDialogNote
data.value: Save the image to a file.

data.name: CommandExportImageNote
data.value: Save the image to a file. The storage folder is specified by a command parameter.

data.name: CommandFocusBookmarkListNote
data.value: Display bookmark list of the bookshelf.

data.name: CommandFocusFolderSearchBoxNote
data.value: Focus search box. The bookshelf is displayed.

data.name: CommandFocusMainViewNote
data.value: Move focus to the main view.

data.name: CommandHelpCommandListNote
data.value: Displays help of all commands in the browser.

data.name: CommandHelpMainMenuNote
data.value: Display the main menu help on the browser.

data.name: CommandHelpSearchOptionNote
data.value: Display the search options help on the browser.

data.name: CommandImportBackupNote
data.value: Select the restored item from the backup file and restore it.

data.name: CommandJumpPageNote
data.value: Enter the page number and move.

data.name: CommandLoadAsNote
data.value: Select and open the compressed file or image file.

data.name: CommandLoupeScaleDownNote
data.value: Reduce the loupe magnification. It functions only when using a loupe.

data.name: CommandLoupeScaleUpNote
data.value: Expands the magnifying power of the loupe. It functions only when using a loupe.

data.name: CommandMoveToChildBookNote
data.value: When the page is a book, open that book.

data.name: CommandMoveToParentBookNote
data.value: Open the upper hierarchy as a book.

data.name: CommandNextFolderNote
data.value: Load the next book on the bookshelf.

data.name: CommandNextFolderPageNote
data.value: Move to the first page of the next folder of the book. Valid only in name order.

data.name: CommandNextHistoryNote
data.value: Load the following new history book.

data.name: CommandNextOnePageNote
data.value: Only one page will move in the next direction.

data.name: CommandNextPagemarkInBookNote
data.value: Move to the next page mark in the current book.

data.name: CommandNextPagemarkNote
data.value: Go to the next page mark.

data.name: CommandNextPageNote
data.value: Move to next page direction. If it is 2 page display, it moves by 2 pages.

data.name: CommandNextScrollPageNote
data.value: Page Scrolls the image in the next direction. If it is not possible to scroll, it will move to the next page. When using a loupe, only move pages.

data.name: CommandNextSizePageNote
data.value: Move to the next direction by the set number of pages.

data.name: CommandOpenApplicationNote
data.value: Open the displayed image with an external application.

data.name: CommandOpenFilePlaceNote
data.value: Open the file of the page you are viewing in Explorer.

data.name: CommandOpenSettingFilesFolderNote
data.value: Open the folder where the configuration file setting file is saved.

data.name: CommandPrevFolderNote
data.value: Load the previous book on the bookshelf.

data.name: CommandPrevFolderPageNote
data.value: Move to the first page of the previous folder of the book. Valid only in name order.

data.name: CommandPrevHistoryNote
data.value: Load the previous old history book.

data.name: CommandPrevPagemarkInBookNote
data.value: Move to the previous page mark in the current book.

data.name: CommandPrevPagemarkNote
data.value: Go to the previous page mark.

data.name: CommandPrevPageNote
data.value: Move to the front of the page. If it is 2 page display, it moves by 2 pages.

data.name: CommandPrevScrollPageNote
data.value: Scroll the image forward in the page. If it is not possible to scroll, it will move to the previous page. When using a loupe, only move pages.

data.name: CommandPrevSizePageNote
data.value: It moves forward by the set number of pages.

data.name: CommandSetBackgroundAutoNote
data.value: Set the background color from the image. Specifically, the color of the upper left pixel of the image is used.

data.name: CommandSetBackgroundCheckDarkNote
data.value: Make the background a black checkered pattern.

data.name: CommandSetBackgroundCheckNote
data.value: Make the background a white checkered pattern.

data.name: CommandSetBackgroundCustomNote
data.value: Make the background a custom background.

data.name: CommandSetBookReadOrderLeftNote
data.value: Left forward from left to right. The younger page turns to the left when 2 page is displayed.

data.name: CommandSetBookReadOrderRightNote
data.value: Left forward from left to right. The young page turns to the right when 2 page is displayed.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByEntryTimeANote
data.value: Set the order of books in ascending order by entry time.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByEntryTimeDNote
data.value: Set the order of books in descending order by entry time.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByFileNameANote
data.value: Set the order of books in ascending order by name.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByFileNameDNote
data.value: Set the order of books in descending order by name.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByFileTypeANote
data.value: Set the order of books in ascending order by file type.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByFileTypeDNote
data.value: Set the order of books in descending order by file type.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByPathANote
data.value: Set the order of books in ascending order by full path.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByPathDNote
data.value: Set the order of books in descending order by full path.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByRandomNote
data.value: Set the order of books randomly.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderBySizeANote
data.value: Set the order of books in ascending order by size.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderBySizeDNote
data.value: Set the order of books in descending order by size.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByTimeStampANote
data.value: Set the order of books in ascending order by date.

data.name: CommandSetFolderOrderByTimeStampDNote
data.value: Set the order of books in descending order by darte.

data.name: CommandSetSortModeFileNameDescendingNote
data.value: Sort the order of the pages in descending order by file name.

data.name: CommandSetSortModeFileNameNote
data.value: Sort the order of the pages in ascending order by filename.

data.name: CommandSetSortModeSizeDescendingNote
data.value: Set the order of pages in descending order of file size.

data.name: CommandSetSortModeSizeNote
data.value: Set the order of pages in ascending order by file size.

data.name: CommandSetSortModeTimeStampDescendingNote
data.value: Sort the order of pages by file date descending order.

data.name: CommandSetSortModeTimeStampNote
data.value: Sort the order of pages by file date ascending order.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeInsideNote
data.value: Reduce the image to fit in the window and display it.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeNoneNote
data.value: Display the image as it is.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeOutsideNote
data.value: The image is enlarged as much as possible so that it fits in the window.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeUniformNote
data.value: Scales the image to fit the window size.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeUniformToFillNote
data.value: Scale up or down to fit the window size either vertically or horizontally. The image will be larger than the window size.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeUniformToHorizontalNote
data.value: Scales to fit the width of the image to the width of the window.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeUniformToSizeNote
data.value: Scales the image so that it is equal to the area size of ​​the window.

data.name: CommandSetStretchModeUniformToVerticalNote
data.value: Scales to fit the height of the image to the height of the window.

data.name: CommandShowHiddenPanelsNote
data.value: The panel which is hidden automatically is displayed once. It will be canceled by some operation.

data.name: CommandToggleBookmarkNote
data.value: Toggle bookmark registration / release of currently open book.

data.name: CommandToggleCustomSizeNote
data.value: Toggles enabling / disabling of size specification applied to original size.

data.name: CommandToggleFolderOrderNote
data.value: Switch the order of books in order.

data.name: CommandToggleHideMenuNote
data.value: Hide the menu. It is displayed by moving the cursor to the upper end of the window.

data.name: CommandToggleHidePageSliderNote
data.value: Hide the slider. It is displayed by moving the cursor to the lower end of the window.

data.name: CommandToggleHidePanelNote
data.value: Automatically hide the left and right panels. It is displayed by moving the cursor to the left and right edges of the window.

data.name: CommandToggleHideThumbnailListNote
data.value: Display the film strip only when using the slider.

data.name: CommandToggleIsAutoRotateLeftNote
data.value: When displaying the page, left rotate the portrait image 90 degrees. If the window is portrait, rotate horizontally long image by 90 degrees.

data.name: CommandToggleIsAutoRotateRightNote
data.value: When displaying the page, right rotate the portrait image 90 degrees. If the window is portrait, rotate horizontally long image by 90 degrees.

data.name: CommandToggleIsEnabledNearestNeighborNote
data.value: When set to ON, it will expand while maintaining the dot. When it is OFF, scale conversion processing (Fant) is executed.

data.name: CommandToggleIsLoupeNote
data.value: Turn the loupe on or off.

data.name: CommandToggleIsRecursiveFolderNote
data.value: When loading images from folders, subfolders or compressed files are also loaded at the same time.

data.name: CommandToggleIsSupportedDividePageNote
data.value: When one page is displayed, divide the landscape page into pages.

data.name: CommandToggleIsSupportedSingleFirstPageNote
data.value: Even on 2 page display, the first page is displayed as 1 page.

data.name: CommandToggleIsSupportedSingleLastPageNote
data.value: Even on 2 page display, the last page is displayed on 1 page.

data.name: CommandToggleIsSupportedWidePageNote
data.value: When two pages are displayed, the horizontally long image is regarded as two pages and is displayed independently.

data.name: CommandToggleMediaPlayNote
data.value: Toggle between playing and stopping the movie.

data.name: CommandTogglePageListPlacementNote
data.value: Switch placement of page list between bookshelf and side panel

data.name: CommandTogglePageListPlacementPanel
data.value: Place page list on side panel

data.name: CommandTogglePagemarkNote
data.value: Toggles registration / cancellation of page mark of currently open page.

data.name: CommandTogglePageModeNote
data.value: Switch between 1 page display and 2 page display.

data.name: CommandTogglePermitFileCommandNote
data.value: Toggle enable / disable of file operation command.

data.name: CommandToggleSlideShowNote
data.value: Toggle play / stop of the slideshow.

data.name: CommandToggleSortModeNote
data.value: Switch the order of the pages in order.

data.name: CommandToggleStretchModeNote
data.value: Switch the view stretch in order.

data.name: CommandToggleStretchModeReverseNote
data.value: Switch the image stretch in order (reverse).

data.name: CommandToggleTopmostNote
data.value: Always display the window in front.

data.name: CommandToggleViewFlipHorizontalNote
data.value: Flip the image left and right.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleAddressBarNote
data.value: Toggle vidible / hide of the address bar.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleBookmarkListNote
data.value: Toggle vidible / hide of the bookmark list panel.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleBookshelfNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of the bookshelf panel.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleEffectInfoNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of the effect panel.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleFileInfoNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of the file information panel.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleFoldersTreeNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of the Folders tree. The bookshelf is displayed.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleHistoryListNote
data.value: Toggle vidible / hide of the history list panel.

data.name: CommandToggleVisiblePageListNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of the page list. The bookshelf is displayed.

data.name: CommandToggleVisiblePagemarkListNote
data.value: Toggle vidible / hide of the pagemark list panel.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleThumbnailListNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of the filmstrip.

data.name: CommandToggleVisibleTitleBarNote
data.value: Toggle visible / hide of window title bar.

data.name: CommandToggleWindowMaximizeNote
data.value: Maximize the window. If it has already been maximized, restore it to its original size.

data.name: CommandTouchEmulateNote
data.value: Execute the touch command at the mouse cursor position.

data.name: CommandViewFlipHorizontalOnNote
data.value: Flip the image left and right.

data.name: CommandViewResetNote
data.value: Initialize rotation, scaling, movement, and inversion by manipulating the view.

data.name: CommandViewRotateLeftNote
data.value: Rotates the image to the left.

data.name: CommandViewRotateRightNote
data.value: Rotate the image to the right.

data.name: CommandViewScrollDownNote
data.value: Roll the image downwards. When it is not possible to scroll vertically, side scrolling will occur.

data.name: CommandViewScrollLeftNote
data.value: Roll the image to the left. If horizontal scrolling is not possible, vertical scrolling will occur.

data.name: CommandViewScrollRightNote
data.value: Roll the image to the right. If horizontal scrolling is not possible, vertical scrolling will occur.

data.name: CommandViewScrollUpNote
data.value: Roll the image upwards. When it is not possible to scroll vertically, side scrolling will occur.

data.name: ControlAboutNew
data.value: A new version has been released

data.name: ControlAboutWrongFormat
data.value: The format of the update page is different from what is supposed

data.name: ControlCommandResetMessage
data.value: Initialize all command settings. Is it OK?

data.name: ControlCommandResetTypeANote
data.value: By clicking the mouse, "@CommandPrevPage" "@CommandNextPage". In the wheel operation, "@CommandPrevScrollPage" "@CommandNextScrollPage".

data.name: ControlCommandResetTypeBNote
data.value: In the wheel operation, "@CommandPrevPage" "@CommandNextPage". By right-click, "@CommandOpenContextMenu". Left click is undefined.

data.name: ControlCommandResetTypeCNote
data.value: By clicking the mouse, "@CommandPrevPage" "@CommandNextPage". In the wheel operation, "@CommandViewScrollUp" "@CommandViewScrollDown".

data.name: ControlEditCommandVisible
data.value: Display a message when executing a command

data.name: ControlEditDragNote
data.value: Mouse button input in light blue frame. You can not use right button drag because it is reserved with mouse gesture.

data.name: ControlEditGestureInputGesture
data.value: Here gesture input (Hold down the right button while dragging)

data.name: ControlEditGestureNote
data.value: Enter a mouse gesture within a light blue frame. Mouse gesture is a drag operation while holding down the right mouse button. A left click can be registered as the last gesture key.

data.name: ControlEditTouchNote
data.value: Specify the area to touch. If Center is not assigned to a command, the judgment of the area (L1, L2, R1, R2) below it is applied. Please substitute gesture for flick operation.

data.name: ControlFileNameBoxFileNote
data.value: Please enter the path of the file

data.name: ControlResolveConflictNote
data.value: Please select only one command to execute with "{0}"

data.name: DialogBookmarkError
data.value: Temporary folders can not be bookmarked

data.name: DialogConfirmRecursive
data.value: There is no file that can be read in "{0}". Do you also load subfolders or compressed files?

data.name: DialogDeleteApplicationData
data.value:
Delete user data. Are you sure?
The following data will be deleted - Setting file - History file - Bookmark file - Pagemark file - Cache file

data.name: DialogDragActionLockedTitle
data.value: This operation can not be changed

data.name: DialogDragActionReset
data.value: Initialize all drag operations. Is it OK?

data.name: DialogFileDelete
data.value: Do you want to move this {0} to Recycle Bin?

data.name: DialogFileDeleteError
data.value: Delete failed. Would you like to try again?

data.name: DialogFileDeleteErrorTitle
data.value: Delete failed. Would you like to retry?

data.name: DialogFileRenameConfrict
data.value: {0} already exists. Would you like to rename it to {1}?

data.name: DialogFileRenameConfrictTitle
data.value: A file with the same name exists

data.name: DialogFileRenameExtension
data.value: Changing the extension may make it impossible to use it. Is it OK?

data.name: DialogFileRenameFailed
data.value: Failed to change the name. Would you like to try again?

data.name: DialogFileRenameInvalid
data.value: The file name contains characters that can not be used.

data.name: DialogFileRenameWrong
data.value: The specified file name is invalid.

data.name: DialogFileRenameWrongDevice
data.value: The specified device name is invalid.

data.name: DialogHistoryDeleteAll
data.value: Delete all history. Is it OK?

data.name: DialogImageExportError
data.value: This image can not be output.

data.name: DialogImportSelectTitle
data.value: Please select the item to be imported

data.name: DialogMergeFolderTitle
data.value: Do you want to merge folders?

data.name: DialogOpenSettingFolderError
data.value: The location of the setting file can not be opened with the store application

data.name: DialogOpenSettingFolderErrorTitle
data.value: This command can not be used

data.name: DialogPagemarkError
data.value: Temporary folders can not be pagemarked

data.name: DialogPagemarkFolderDelete
data.value: The {0} pagemarks included are also deleted.

data.name: DialogPageViewRecordWriteError
data.value: Could not write Page view record

data.name: DialogQuickAccessTempError
data.value: Temporary folders can not be added to quick access.

data.name: EnumBrushTypeImageUniformToFill
data.value: Extend the image to the full window

data.name: EnumPageStretchModeInside
data.value: Fit to window size if large

data.name: EnumPageStretchModeOutside
data.value: Expand to window size if small

data.name: EnumPageStretchModeUniformToFill
data.value: Extend it to fill the window

data.name: EnumPageStretchModeUniformToSize
data.value: Fit the area size to the window

data.name: ExceptionCannotDeleteData
data.value: It is not an AppData folder, so it will not be deleted.

data.name: ExceptionCritical
data.value: An error occurred. Quit the application.

data.name: ExceptionCriticalLogPath
data.value: Details of the error are saved in {0}

data.name: ExceptionNotSupportArchiveFolder
data.value: Compressed file folders are not supported.

data.name: ExceptionNotSupportedKey
data.value: The combination of {0} key and modifier key is not supported in {1}.

data.name: ExceptionSusieLoadFailed
data.value: Failed to load image at Susie.

data.name: FolderTreeMenuAddCurrentQuickAccess
data.value: Add current place to quick access

data.name: HelpCommandMessage
data.value: Commands to which no operation is assigned can be used by setting with "Edit commands".

data.name: MenuTreeHistory
data.value: Open from the list of recent books

data.name: NotifyCacheErrorDirectoryNotFound
data.value: Folder not found. ({0}) Initialize the cache location.

data.name: NotifyFirstPagemark
data.value: There is no pagemark before the current page

data.name: NotifyHeifHelp
data.value: In order to display the HEIF image it is necessary to install the additional codec "HEIF Image Extensions".

data.name: NotifyHistoryTerminal
data.value: There is no history older than this

data.name: NotifyInvalidFileNameChars
data.value: The following characters can not be used in the file name: \ / : * ? " < > |

data.name: NotifyLastPagemark
data.value: There is no pagemark after the current page

data.name: NotifyLoadSettingFailed
data.value: Failed to load settings. It starts up with the default setting.

data.name: NotifyTemporaryErrorDirectoryNotFound
data.value: Folder not found. ({0}) Initialize the temporary location.

data.name: OptionErrorArgumentFailed
data.value: You can not use {1} as an argument to {0}.

data.name: OptionErrorFileNotFound
data.value: Specified configuration file does not exist

data.name: OptionIsBlank
data.value: Start up without opening the image file

data.name: OptionIsFullScreen
data.value: Specify whether to start with full screen

data.name: OptionIsNewWindow
data.value: Specify whether to start in a new window

data.name: OptionIsSlideShow
data.value: Specify whether to start a slideshow

data.name: OptionSettingFilename
data.value: Specify the path of the setting file (UserSetting.xml)

data.name: OptionTerminater
data.value: Indicates the end of option list. Subsequent arguments are considered file names.

data.name: ParamArchiveRecursiveModeTips
data.value: Extended range when opening compressed file

data.name: ParamArchiverMediaSupportFileTypesTips
data.value: Probably what you can play with Windows Media Player is playable.

data.name: ParamArchiverPdfRenderSizeTips
data.value: Normally we will render according to the display size, but the lower limit will be this standard size. If it becomes smaller, it is reduced and displayed.

data.name: ParamBookFilterIsSupportedWidePage
data.value: Landscape page is regarded as 2 pages

data.name: ParamBookIsAllFileAnImage
data.value: A file whose extension is unknown is regarded as an image file

data.name: ParamBookIsEnableAnimatedGifTips
data.value: Perform animated GIF playback. Memory consumption problems may occur with long GIFs.

data.name: ParamBookIsLoadingPageVisible
data.value: Display the current page until the next page loads

data.name: ParamBookIsLoadingPageVisibleTips
data.value: You can save memory by turning it off.

data.name: ParamBookIsMultiplePageMove
data.value: Accept duplication of page movement commands

data.name: ParamBookIsMultiplePageMoveTips
data.value: Execute all requested page move commands. If it is set to OFF, duplicate page move commands are canceled.

data.name: ParamBookIsPrioritizePageMoveTips
data.value: Perform page movement without waiting for page display.

data.name: ParamBookIsRecursiveFolderTips
data.value: Because it searches all open folders and below, the processing becomes heavy depending on the location of the folder.

data.name: ParamBookIsSupportedWidePage
data.value: Landscape page is regarded as 2 pages

data.name: ParamBookOperationPageEndAction
data.value: Behavior when trying to move past the end of the page

data.name: ParamBookPageCollectModeTips
data.value: If you make a folder a page, you can open the folder from that page.

data.name: ParamBookshelfExcludePattern
data.value: Filename pattern to exclude from display

data.name: ParamBookshelfExcludePatternTips
data.value: It is specified with .NET regular expression. Capital letters and lower case letters are not distinguished.

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsCloseBookWhenMove
data.value: Close the book when changing the location

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsCruiseTips
data.value: Move the folder including the parent and child of the folder. It does not apply when the bookshelf is a search result.

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsInsertItem
data.value: Insert additional file at sort position

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsInsertItemTips
data.value: The bookshelf reflects information in real time. If this setting is ON, inserts the added file in the current sort order position. When set to OFF, it is added to the end of the list.

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsMultipleRarFilterEnabled
data.value: Filter RAR split files from display

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsMultipleRarFilterEnabledTips
data.value: For an RAR split file called .part[number].rar, only the file with the smallest number is displayed in the list.

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsOpenNextBookWhenRemove
data.value: After deleting the viewing book, open the next book

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsSyncFolderTree
data.value: Synchronize Folders tree with sync button

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsVisibleBookmarkMarkTips
data.value: ★ mark is displayed in the bookmarked book.

data.name: ParamBookshelfIsVisibleHistoryMarkTips
data.value: A check mark is displayed in the book remaining in the history.

data.name: ParamBookWideRatio
data.value: Aspect ratio for determining horizontally long image (horizontal / vertical)

data.name: ParamBookWideRatioTips
data.value: It is used in "Split landscape page".

data.name: ParamCacheDirectoryTips
data.value: This is the storage location of the thumbnail cache (Cache.db).

data.name: ParamCacheMemorySizeTips
data.value: Once the page has been read, it is stored in memory to speed up redisplay. This value is a guideline, and memory may be used beyond this value. Note that too large a value can make the system unstable.

data.name: ParamClipboardArchiveSeparater
data.value: Delimiter between compressed file and filename

data.name: ParamCommandIsReversePageMove
data.value: Swap movement direction of page movement command according to slider direction

data.name: ParamCommandIsReversePageMoveTips
data.value: When the slider is from left to right, reverse the page moving direction. The setting of the command to work is set by "@ParamCommandParameterIsReverse" of the command parameter.

data.name: ParamCommandIsReversePageMoveWheelTips
data.value: You can select correspondence only for wheel operation.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterIsReverse
data.value: Enable operation swap by slider direction

data.name: ParamCommandParameterIsReverseTips
data.value: Allows the operation replacement by changing the slider direction.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterMovePagemarkIncludeTerminal
data.value: Include the first and last pages

data.name: ParamCommandParameterRotateAmountTips
data.value: It is an angle which rotates by one operation. (0-180)

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScaleAmountTips
data.value: It is the rate of change by one operation. (0-100)

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScaleSnapDefaultTips
data.value: Make sure to zoom in and out by 100%.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScrollAllowCrossTips
data.value: If you can not scroll in the axial direction, sucrose in the direction perpendicular to the axis.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScrollAmountTips
data.value: The ratio (0-100) of the screen to scroll in one operation.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScrollPageAmountTips
data.value: The ratio to the screen to scroll in one operation. (0-100)

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScrollPageMarginTips
data.value: Scroll only if you can scroll above this pixel width.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScrollPageNTips
data.value: If vertically scrollable, scroll vertically as well. If you can scroll vertically and horizontally, scroll to draw N characters.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterScrollPageStopTips
data.value: When it is executed continuously for a short time, it does not move the page.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterStretchModeIsToggleTips
data.value: If the scale mode is already specified, it will be the original size

data.name: ParamContentCanvasContentsSpaceTips
data.value: Sets the gap between page and page. Negative values ​​mean overlapping. Because each page is scaled, it is rare that there will be no gap just at 0.

data.name: ParamCustomBackgroundTips
data.value: This setting is applied when the background is set to "custom background".

data.name: ParamDownloadPathTips
data.value: It is a storage place of the image dropped by the browser etc. If not specified, temporary folder is used.

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsKeepAngle
data.value: Keeping rotation even if you change the page

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsKeepAngleTips
data.value: This setting does not work when automatic rotation is enabled.

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsKeepFlip
data.value: Maintain reversal even when changing page

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsKeepScale
data.value: Maintain scaling even when changing pages

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsOriginalScaleShowMessage
data.value: Make the scale display of the view operation the original image size standard

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsOriginalScaleShowMessageTips
data.value: In case of 2 page display, we refer to the page with the younger number.

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsViewStartPositionCenter
data.value: Use the display start position as the center of the image

data.name: ParamDragTransformIsViewStartPositionCenterTips
data.value: When set to OFF, it becomes the upper right reference and the upper left reference depending on the spreading direction.

data.name: ParamExportImageQualityLevelTips
data.value: It is used only when conversion is required.

data.name: ParamExternalArchiveSeparater
data.value: Delimiter between compressed file and filename

data.name: ParamExternalCommandTips
data.value: If not specified, launch the application associated with the extension.

data.name: ParamExternalProtocolTips
data.value: $File will be replaced with the file path. $Uri is replaced with the URI escaped file path.

data.name: ParamFileInformationIsUseExifDateTimeTips
data.value: It is limited to display on the file information panel. It does not affect sorting by date.

data.name: ParamFileInformationIsVisibleBitsPerPixel
data.value: Display the number of bits per pixel in image size

data.name: ParamFileInformationIsVisibleFilePath
data.value: Display the file path in the compressed file

data.name: ParamFileInformationIsVisibleLoader
data.value: Display used archiver, image decoder name

data.name: ParamFilmStripIsManipulationBoundaryFeedbackEnabled
data.value: Touch scroll termination bound on filmstrip

data.name: ParamFilmStripIsSelectedCenter
data.value: Scroll so that the selected item appears in the center

data.name: ParamFilmStripIsVisibleThumbnailPlateTips
data.value: Display the background of the filmstrip in the case of automatically hidden settings

data.name: ParamHistoryEntryPageCount
data.value: Number of page operations to start history registration

data.name: ParamHistoryEntryPageCountTips
data.value: Register in history with page movement operation more than this count or last page display.

data.name: ParamHistoryIsKeepLastFolderTips
data.value: The location of the bookshelf if you do not open the book at startup.

data.name: ParamImageEffectIsHsvModeTips
data.value: Set the color parameter with HSV (Hue, Saturation, Brightness). When set to OFF, it becomes the setting with RGB.

data.name: ParamInfoMessageViewTransformShowMessageStyle
data.value: Sbow status change by drag operation

data.name: ParamIsAccessKeyEnabledTips
data.value: If it is set to OFF, system operation by Alt key will be invalid and malfunction will be eliminated when used with command shortcut. However Alt+F4 is always active.

data.name: ParamIsAutoGCTips
data.value: When it is OFF, memory is released every time page is switched

data.name: ParamIsAutoRecursive
data.value: Automatically load subfolder when there is no page and only one subfolder exists

data.name: ParamIsCancelSlideByMouseMove
data.value: Reset display interval with mouse move

data.name: ParamIsCancelSlideByMouseMoveTips
data.value: When set to OFF, it will only be reset by clear action such as clicking.

data.name: ParamIsCaptionEmulateInFullScreen
data.value: Title bar operation at full screen

data.name: ParamIsCaptionEmulateInFullScreenTips
data.value: Enable the title bar operation (double click and drag) on ​​the menu at full screen.

data.name: ParamIsConfirmRecursive
data.value: If there is no page, inquire whether to read the subfolder

data.name: ParamIsConfirmRecursiveTips
data.value: If there is no page that can be displayed when the book is opened, and a subfolder exists, a dialog is displayed asking whether to load the subfolder.

data.name: ParamIsExplorerContextMenuEnabled
data.value: Register in the Explorer context menu.

data.name: ParamIsExplorerContextMenuEnabledTips
data.value: Add "Open in NeeView" to the Explorer context menu. This feature uses the registry.

data.name: ParamIsForceUpdateHistory
data.value: Even if you open a book from history, it updates the last browsing date

data.name: ParamIsHidePageSliderInFullscreen
data.value: Automatically hide the slider when it is full screen

data.name: ParamIsHidePanelInFullscreen
data.value: Automatically hide the side panel when it is full screen

data.name: ParamIsIgnoreImageDpiTips
data.value: When displaying in original size, make it match with display pixels without depending on DPI.

data.name: ParamIsInnerArchiveHistoryEnabled
data.value: Save recursive compressed file in history

data.name: ParamIsNetworkEnabledTips
data.value: In this application, we will use the network only for WEB links such as version update confirmation and online help from "About" dialog.

data.name: ParamIsOpenbookAtCurrentPlace
data.value: Make the start position of the file selection dialog in "@CommandLoadAs" the location of the currently opened book

data.name: ParamIsRemoveConfirmed
data.value: Show confirmation dialog when deleting files

data.name: ParamIsRestoreSecondWindowTips
data.value: Also restore window coordinates when duplicates are activated. When set to OFF, it is displayed in the initial coordinates.

data.name: ParamIsSettingBackup
data.value: Make a backup of the user setting file

data.name: ParamIsSettingBackupTips
data.value: Make a backup of the configuration file and load it instead if the normal configuration file can not be read. The file name is UserSetting.xaml.old. The update timing is when you close the setting window and when you exit the application.

data.name: ParamIsSlideShowByLoopTips
data.value: After playing to the last page, it will return to the first page.

data.name: ParamIsSyncUserSettingTips
data.value: When multi-booting, all NeeView settings are updated when closing the setting window.

data.name: ParamIsUncHistoryEnabledTips
data.value: Save the path on the network like "\\computer\~" in the history.

data.name: ParamIsVisibleBusy
data.value: The image reading processing in progress mark is displayed on the upper left of the screen

data.name: ParamIsVisibleWindowTitle
data.value: When the title bar is not displayed, the window title is displayed in the display area

data.name: ParamJobEngineWorkerSize
data.value: Number of threads used for image loading

data.name: ParamLanguageTips
data.value: * It is applied from the next startup.

data.name: ParamListItemBannerImageWidthTips
data.value: The width of the image in banner style. The vertical width is 1/4 of the horizontal width. If it exceeds 256, the image will be rough.

data.name: ParamListItemContentImagePopupTips
data.value: When placing the cursor on the icon, a large image will be displayed in the popup.

data.name: ParamListItemContentImageWidthTips
data.value: The width of the image in content style. If it exceeds 256, the image will be rough.

data.name: ParamListItemContentIsDecoratePlace
data.value: Format path display of supplemental text

data.name: ParamListItemContentNoteOpacity
data.value: Supplemental text transparency in content style.

data.name: ParamListItemContentNoteOpacityTips
data.value: Transparency of supplemental text in content style.

data.name: ParamListItemThumbnailImageWidthTips
data.value: The width of the image in thumbnail style. If it exceeds 256, the image will be rough.

data.name: ParamListItemThumbnailNameVisibled
data.value: Display the name when thumbnail style.

data.name: ParamLoupeIsEscapeKeyEnabled
data.value: Use the Esc key to release the loupe

data.name: ParamLoupeIsLoupeCenter
data.value: At the start, move the cursor position to the screen center

data.name: ParamLoupeIsResetByPageChanged
data.value: Release the loupe after moving the page

data.name: ParamLoupeIsResetByRestartTips
data.value: When set to OFF, the previous magnification will be inherited.

data.name: ParamLoupeIsVisibleLoupeInfoTips
data.value: The magnification will be displayed on the upper right of the screen during loupe.

data.name: ParamLoupeIsWheelScalingEnabled
data.value: When using a loupe, change the magnifying power by wheel operation

data.name: ParamLoupeIsWheelScalingEnabledTips
data.value: Commands to which wheel operation is assigned are invalid.

data.name: ParamMediaStartDelaySecondsTips
data.value: If 0 is specified, the contents may flicker.

data.name: ParamMouseGestureMinimumDistanceTips
data.value: By moving this distance, it is judged as a gesture stroke.

data.name: ParamMouseLongButtonDownTimeTips
data.value: It is time to be judged to be long pressed.

data.name: ParamMouseMinimumDragDistanceTips
data.value: First moving distance to become a drag or gesture

data.name: ParamPageListPlacementInBookshelfTips
data.value: When turned OFF, it becomes a side panel.

data.name: ParamPictureProfileIsAspectRatioEnabledTips
data.value: Display with the aspect ratio set for the image.

data.name: ParamPictureProfileIsLimitSourceSizeTips
data.value: Reduce the imported image with "@ParamPictureProfileMaximumSize" as the upper limit. It is setting for speed and memory saving. When this restriction is applied, "*" will be displayed in the size field of the file information if it is the loaded image.

data.name: ParamPictureProfileIsSvgEnabledTips
data.value: Open an SVG file as a page. Please turn off when you want to display SVG with Susie plug-in.

data.name: ParamPictureProfileMaximumSizeTips
data.value: This is the maximum image size enlarged by the resize filter.

data.name: ParamPreLoadSizeTips
data.value: Read ahead within the cache memory size.

data.name: ParamSeCannotMove
data.value: Sound when not able to move

data.name: ParamSevenZipArchiverIsPreExtractToMemory
data.value: In the case of a solid compressed file, expand it in memory in advance

data.name: ParamSevenZipArchiverIsPreExtractToMemoryTips
data.value: It speeds up by expanding not in temporary files but in memory. The memory consumed is secured separately from the book cache memory.

data.name: ParamSevenZipArchiverPreExtractSolidSize
data.value: Maximum solid compressed file extraction size to be extracted in advance (MB)

data.name: ParamSevenZipArchiverPreExtractSolidSizeTips
data.value: Compressed files exceeding this extraction size will not be pre-extracted. Set 0 to prohibit all pre-extraction. The Susie archive does not determine this size, but only pre-extraction in the plug-in settings.

data.name: ParamSevenZipArchiverX64DllPathTips
data.value: Set this if you want to use another 7z.dll. To reflect, you need to reopen the application.

data.name: ParamSevenZipArchiverX86DllPathTips
data.value: Set this if you want to use another 7z.dll. To reflect, you need to reopen the application.

data.name: ParamSidePanelHitTestMargin
data.value: Area width of automatic panel display judgment

data.name: ParamSidePanelIsLeftRightKeyEnabled
data.value: The left and right key input of the side panel is valid

data.name: ParamSidePanelIsLeftRightKeyEnabledTips
data.value: Activate left / right key operation on the side panel. In the bookshelf, move the folder hierarchically.

data.name: ParamSidePanelIsManipulationBoundaryFeedbackEnabled
data.value: Touch scroll termination bound on side panel

data.name: ParamSidePanelOpacityTips
data.value: It is effective in auto-hide mode.

data.name: ParamSliderIsLinkedThumbnailList
data.value: Real time change with slider applies only to film strip

data.name: ParamSliderOpacityTips
data.value: It is effective in auto-hide mode.

data.name: ParamSusieIsFirstOrderSusieArchive
data.value: Prioritize Susie plugin in compressed file expansion

data.name: ParamSusieIsFirstOrderSusieImage
data.value: Prioritize Susie plugin in image display

data.name: ParamSusieIsPluginCacheEnabledTips
data.value: If it is unstable, it may stabilize when it is OFF.

data.name: ParamTemporaryDirectoryTips
data.value: It is used for pre-extraction and recursive compression files.

data.name: ParamThumbnailBookCapacityTips
data.value: The number of book thumbnails held in memory.

data.name: ParamThumbnailFormatTips
data.value: Png is high quality but consumes more memory than Jpeg.

data.name: ParamThumbnailPageCapacityTips
data.value: The number of page thumbnails held in memory. When the book is closed everything is destroyed.

data.name: ParamThumbnailQualityTips
data.value: Quality when the thumbnail image format is Jpeg.

data.name: ParamTouchGestureMinimumDistance
data.value: Minimum movement distance for touch drag judgment

data.name: ParamTouchGestureMinimumDistanceTips
data.value: Dragging is judged to start for the first time by moving this distance.

data.name: ParamTouchIsEnabledTips
data.value: When set to OFF, it functions as standard mouse operation.

data.name: ParamTouchIsScaleEnabled
data.value: Enable sizing operation with pinch in and pinch out

data.name: ParamTouchMinimumManipulationDistance
data.value: Touch operation pinch minimum change distance

data.name: ParamTouchMinimumManipulationDistanceTips
data.value: This is the minimum operating distance at which rotation and enlargement / reduction by touch operation are effective.

data.name: ParamTouchMinimumManipulationRadius
data.value: Touch operation pinch minimum determination distance

data.name: ParamTouchMinimumManipulationRadiusTips
data.value: It is the distance between the minimum of 2 touches judged as rotation by touch operation, enlargement / reduction.

data.name: ParamWindowChromeFrame
data.value: Window frame with title bar hidden

data.name: ParamWindowShapeChromeFrame
data.value: Window frame with title bar hidden

data.name: ParamWindowShapeIsFullScreenWithTaskBar
data.value: Do not cover the task bar area at full screen

data.name: ParamWindowShapeMaximizeWindowGapWidth
data.value: Gap adjustment of window maximization with title bar hidden

data.name: ParamWindowShapeMaximizeWindowGapWidthTips
data.value: If there is a gap in maximizing the window with the title bar hidden, adjust with this value.

data.name: ParamZipArchiverIsEnabled
data.value: Use ZIP compressed file expansion with standard function

data.name: SettingItemRemoveTips
data.value: Delete the user data and exit the application. It is used when you want to completely delete history etc. before uninstallation.

data.name: SettingPageBookPageSettingTips
data.value: The left item is the default value, and the right item is the behavior when the book is opened.

data.name: SettingPageExternalGeneralSaveTips
data.value: This is the setting of the command to save the image

data.name: SettingPageGeneralBootBootDetailTips
data.value: * This setting will be reflected after closing the setting screen.

data.name: SettingPageGeneralBootBootTips
data.value: * This setting will be reflected after closing the setting screen.

data.name: SettingPageGeneralLocationTypesTips
data.value: * It is applied from the next startup.

data.name: SettingPageGeneralSaveDataTypesTips
data.value: * The file location will be applied the next time you start up. Please use export, import to take over data.

data.name: SettingPageHistoryGeneralLimitTips
data.value: Sets the maximum number of history saved in the history file. The history during application operation is not limited.

data.name: SettingPageManipurateMouseVisibilityTips
data.value: If you do not operate the mouse for a certain time, the cursor will be hidden.

data.name: SettingPageVisualWindowTitileNote
data.value:
Format Description
$Book .. Name of the book $Page[LR] .. Current page number $PageMax .. Maximum page number $ViewScale .. Scale by view operation (%) $FullName[LR] .. File name including path $Name[LR] .. File name $Size[LR] .. File size (ex. 100 × 100) $SizeEx[LR] .. File size + number of pixel bits (ex. 100 × 100 × 24) $Scale[LR] .. Image scale (%)
"◯◯◯[LR]" indicates that the variable name changes for 1 page or 2 pages. For example, $Name is for 1 page, $NameL is for 2 pages left, $NameR is for 2 pages right. $Name is the main page (the smaller page number) when displaying 2 pages.

data.name: Ver320Note
data.value: · The bookmark list was integrated with the folder list and it became a bookshelf. · The folder of the pagemark list is now automatically created.

data.name: AutoHideFocusLockModeTips
data.value: It is not hidden when it has focus.

data.name: IsAutoHideKeyDownDelay
data.value: Auto-hide panel key input display continued

data.name: IsAutoHideKeyDownDelayTips
data.value: Postpone the action to hide when key input.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterExportImageQualityLevelTips
data.value: It is used only when conversion is required.

data.name: ParamCommandParameterExportDefaultFolderTips
data.value: Output folder at startup. During startup, it follows the changed storage location.

data.name: ParamIsRemoveExplorerDialogEnabled
data.value: Show Explorer confirmation dialog when deleting files

data.name: ParamIsRemoveExplorerDialogEnabledTips
data.value: The behavior is the same as when deleted from Explorer. If you delete a file that does not fit in the Recycle Bin, a confirmation dialog will appear. However, if you turn on "Display delete confirmation dialog" in the Recycle Bin properties, an additional dialog will appear.
